users.name: Tractor
users.Description: A tractor is a vehicle that's used on a farm or work site, often to pull a trailer or other equipment. A farmer might use a tractor to pull a plow through her corn field before planting.

users.name: Cultivator
users.Description: A cultivator is a piece of agricultural equipment used for secondary tillage. One sense of the name refers to frames with teeth that pierce the soil as they are dragged through it linearly.

users.name: Thresher
users.Description: Thresher, farm machine for separating wheat, peas, soybeans, and other small grain and seed crops from their chaff and straw.

users.name: Harrow
users.Description: A harrow is a piece of farm equipment consisting of a row of blades fixed to a heavy frame. When it is pulled over ploughed land, the blades break up large lumps of soil.

users.name: Trolly
users.Description: This trolley is widely used for moving material from one place to another with an ease. It is strictly checked on different quality parameters assuring its flawlessness at user's end.

users.name: Hand sickle
users.Description: A sickle is a hand-held agricultural tool with a variously curved blade typically used for harvesting grain crops or cutting succulent forage chiefly for feeding livestock

users.name: Showel and spade
users.Description: A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bulk materials, such as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore.

users.name: Axe
users.Description: Axe and our other agricultural tools are manufactured and designed using finest quality material and are commended for their perfect finish.

users.name: Axe
users.Description: A hoe is an ancient and versatile agricultural hand tool used to shape the soil, control weeds, clear soil, and harvest root crops.

users.name: PickAxe
users.Description: A pickaxe or pick is a hand tool with a hard head attached perpendicular to the handle. They are used as tools for landscaping, breaking up hard surfaces and as farming implements.

users.name: Sprayer
users.Description: An agricultural crop sprayer is the equipment used for applying liquid substances to plants or crops. These substances could be fertilisers, herbicides, or pesticides

users.name: Sprinkler
users.Description: Sprinkler irrigation is a method of applying irrigation water which is similar to natural rainfall. Water is distributed through a system of pipes usually by pumping.
